attributes.action: Encourage the name of "Republic of Macedonia" to remain the same and not to change despite greek blackmail. This will be done by speaking to Nikola Gruevski the prime minister of Macedonia and telling him that the UK supports Macedonia to keep its current name. Support Macedonia to keep its name.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Greece does not allow Macedonia in NATO because of its name. Greece have caused trouble over the years towards ethnic Macedonians in the Macedonian region of greece where they are treated as second class citizens and this still goes on today. Macedonia shall stay macedonia

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
